The missions of the communication committee includes:


* Support ISoP Five-Year Strategic Plan

* Increase communication among ISoP student members and with larger ISoP communities

* Empower studentsâ€™ achievement by increasing their visibility

* Encourage collaboration among students with diverse backgrounds

The responsibilities includes: 

* Create monthly student newsletters to feature student achievements, important events, job opportunities, and more. [Example](https://isop-student-community.github.io/isop-student-community/MM_issue1.html)

* Create and maintain ISoP Student Community Website

* Organize various events, including social events and journal clubs

**If you are interested in joining the Communication Committee, please contact [Jay (Ya-Feng) Wen](mailto:wenxx164@umn.edu)**
